attributes.action: Enforce agreed conventions re Asylum seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Refuse all applications that fail to apply when first entering safe country following exit.
Honour only applications as per 1951 Geneva Convention on Refugees.
To ensure that asylum can be claimed only by persons who are actually suffering (political) persecution.
Harmonizes the law and interpretation for applications for asylum seekers within the European Union.
A situation of general need, such as poverty, civil war, natural disaster or lack of future prospects, therefore does not constitute grounds for asylum.
Non-state persecution, i.e. persecution which does not emanate from the state, is not considered a legitimate reason for asylum
Reassess and review all previous applications and other limited work permits pending reviews at local levels with central government guidelines
